comments:
Using SVGRenderer, but this may not be renderer-specific.  Creating a dataset 
without setting the label attribute results in NullPointerException when 
rendering:

Suggest making the label attribute Required.

Made the default value for the dataset label in the SVG renderer an empty 
string so that it aligns with the way the SWT Renderer handles dataset labels.
